Perform a search on Treesearch's online interface

treesearch_web_query.Rd

Perform a search on Treesearch's online interface

treesearch_web_query(
  keywords = "",
  authorlastname = "",
  yearfrom = "",
  yearto = "",
  station = "",
  series = "",
  volume = "",
  treesearch_url = "https://www.fs.usda.gov/treesearch/search?"
)

Arguments

keywords

string
authorlastname

string
yearfrom

string
yearto

string
station

string
series

string
volume

string
treesearch_url

string optional argument

Value

dataframe title,id,text for top 20 results (or all if fields blank).

Examples

treesearch_web_query(keywords = "increment-borer methods fire history", 
                 authorlastname <- "Arno")
